title: TiKV panic during upgrading from v4.0.8 to nightly
body:

comments_data.body: @glorv No. It is not from v4.0.8..... It is upgrading from master to release-4.0. So it is not a bug.

> @glorv No. It is not from v4.0.8..... It is upgrading from master to release-4.0. So it is not a bug.

I deleted the comment since it's misleading..
The KMS logic didn't get changed since 4.0GA. Looks like that's a connection issue when connect to AWS?
Not sure if it related to proxy setting: https://github.com/aws/aws-toolkit-vscode/issues/899#issuecomment-589500847

Not sure how it happened since the pod had restarted after TiKV stopped, but I think it is reproducible.
IMO we may need more proper error handling.ðŸ¤”

It seems only occured in upgrade and downgrade tikv version. 
```
"encryption\":{\"data-encryption-method\":\"aes256-ctr\",\"data-key-rotation-period\":\"7d\",\"master-key\":{\"type\":\"kms\",\"key-id\":\"xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx\",\"region\":\"us-west-2\",\"endpoint\":\"\"},\"previous-master-key\":{\"type\":\"plaintext\"}}}
```
this is the tikv config for encryption, please checkout is it any change or misconfiguration

@shuijing198799 the issue you experience with downgrade is caused by incompatible encryption metadata format. #8865 we changed the file format, but for compatibility reason the change isn't cherry-pick into 4.0.x (otherwise it will cause incompatibility between 4.0.x bugfix versions). The error in this case is
```
components/encryption/src/encrypted_file/header.rs:18]: unknown version 2
```
If so desire, we can apply a change to 4.0.x to make it able to downgrade, by making 4.0.x able to read the new file format, and rewrite the file into old format.

> Not sure how it happened since the pod had restarted after TiKV stopped, but I think it is reproducible.
> IMO we may need more proper error handling.

It seems can't reproduce in dbaas. From the log point of view, it is obvious that the kms at that time could not be connected. This may be a problem of the dbaas environment itself at that time, rather than a logical bug. Can you elaborate on the environment and operation path at the time?
My operation path is create 4.0.8 version cluster -> upgrade to nightly.

> components/encryption/src/encrypted_file/header.rs:18]: unknown version 2

Opened issue #9190 and PR #9191 for the fix.
Closing for now if not reproducible. @5kbpers @shuijing198799 please reopen if needed.
